name: Arthur Korn
description:
Let's coin a new word!

"Can you korn a photo id to the company's HR department?"

"A restaurant korned a menu to its loyal customers."

"I don't have the machine to korn you the image, let me just text it."

korn (verb): To send an image, such as a photograph, over fax.

We're naming it after Jewish German inventor Arthur Korn, who pioneered sending images over facsimile. It was once called a "miracle of modern science". So, to korn!

Considering that fax machines are on the verge of extinction, we likely missed the boat on this one...
cons: idering that fax machines are on the verge of extinction, we likely missed the boat on this one...
